title: game abandoned
body: This morning i've a game of 3v3 and after we've finished the game the score borad didn't come up so i pressed 'skip waiting for stars' and then i couldn't match any other game. so i logged off and logged back on but now it says that i'm in a game but i'm not so i'm in the 'game abandoned' page and i couldn't get rid of it. what should i do?!?!?!??!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like your client didn't get told the match ended, you made this post 3 hours ago so if that were the case the issue should be resolved now.

Is everything working as normal again?
yes it worked after 30 minutes thx
it pisses me off so bad, can't do anything RITO HELP?????
Im having that too! Its happening to everyone at this moment RITO HELP PLS
